title: 4.21 Yas update
body: I picked up Yasuo when he was free to play sometime in the 4.19 cycle. He felt fun, but I sucked. With his Q cooldown now set at 4 sec at all ranks, I feel like I'm good at Yasuo finally; it's way easier to get into a poking rhythm, which scratches an itch I have had since you reworked Sona. Thanks Riot!
